2. Exception Handling¶

Todo

Intro to Sinon exception handling.

2.1. Exceptions – sinon.exceptions¶

exception sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

The given URL could not be interpreted, for example due to an incorrect / unknown schema.

exception sinon.api.exceptions.IncorrectURL[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException

The given URL could not be interpreted, for example due to an incorrect / unknown schema.

exception sinon.api.exceptions.BadParameter[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException

A given parameter is out of bound or ill formatted.

exception sinon.api.exceptions.DoesNotExist[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException

An operation tried to access a non-existing entity.

exception sinon.api.exceptions.IncorrectState[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException

The operation is not allowed on the entity in its current state.

exception sinon.api.exceptions.PermissionDenied[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException

The used identity is not permitted to perform the requested operation.

exception sinon.api.exceptions.AuthorizationFailed[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException

The backend could not establish a valid identity.

exception sinon.api.exceptions.AuthenticationFailed[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException

The backend could not establish a valid identity.

exception sinon.api.exceptions.Timeout[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException

The interaction with the backend times out.

exception sinon.api.exceptions.NoSuccess[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.exceptions.SinonException

Some other error occurred.
